post:
Freeweb.ie is an Irish based VPS provider with a focus on quality and value. We guarantee satisfaction or refund within 48 hours.

We host with OVH France on hosting grade AMD Opteron 4386, 64GB RAM, 2TB RAID 1 DISK. 500MBits Guaranteed Internet Uplink. DDoS protected through OVH Anti-DDoS Pro system.

Our latest Offer comes with a massive 100TB bandwidth per month

    512MB Guaranteed RAM
    1GB Burst RAM
    20GB Disk Space
    100TB Bandwidth
    1 vCore
    1 IPv4 / 5 IPv6
    500Mbits Uplink / 1Gbps Interface
    €4 per month

Link  [https://www.freeweb.ie/w/cart.php?a=add&pid=22](https://www.freeweb.ie/w/cart.php?a=add&pid=22)
